name: Rengolio
description:
Made from a YouTube tutorial took me a week but then worked on it so much for 2 to 3 months and now there is hunger fixed building system items main menu and more AND I'M A KID WHO MADE THIS! (This used to be called survive)

survive in the deep dark woods and build shelter. survive zombies and don't starve. your  life counts on it.

things i done by my self:

hunger ,

walls instead logs,

crafting not the widget though,

having to have enough materials to build,

menu and everything in it same with the pause menu,

zombies,

med kit,

stone sword (model was downloaded but I made the animation),

a lot more (well maybe a lot more i don't know) like open door/ wall give me credit i love coding anyway.

remember 2 to 3 moths probably did more or same as the tutorial but I did it and figured it out by my self.

series by Alen Loeb here is the first episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X4DKjFPg1vo&list=PLXBIyoKwiri17edr0Zz2qhSfzGmNeoYkW&index=3
